items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

items.title: All Season
items.description: Most common: Good handle on dry, wet or snow

items.title: Highway
items.description: Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to conquer highways and some off-road terrains.

items.title: Winter
items.description: For snow, ice, and freezing temperatures

items.title: All Weather
items.description: Combines an All Season and Winter tire traits for strong traction year-round

content.body:
### Shop 275/65R20 Tire Size
275/65R20 is a larger tire size that’s commonly found on pickup trucks like the Chevrolet Silverado 3500 HD, Ford F-250 Super Duty, and GMC Sierra 2500 HD. Pickup trucks like this are often used on- and off-road, and a brand new version might have rolled out of the factory with a set of Goodyear Wrangler AT/S, [Michelin LTX A/T2](https://simpletire.com/brands/michelin-tires/ltx-a-t2), or Goodyear Wrangler TrailRunner AT tires attached to give drivers strong performance on any terrain.

Popular vehicles
2020-2021 Chevrolet Silverado 3500 HD
2004-2005, 2011-2021 Ford F-250 Super Duty
2020-2021 GMC Sierra 2500 HD

Maybe you want a set of all-terrain tires for your Chevrolet Silverado 3500 HD that didn’t come with your truck. Check out the Nitto Recon Grappler A/T, BFGoodrich All-Terrain T/A KO2, and [GT Radial Adventuro ATX](https://simpletire.com/brands/gt-radial-tires/adventuro-atx) if you want a set of 275/65R20 all-terrain tires that aren’t OE.

Some drivers like to do a lot of off-road driving in their free time, and drivers of light trucks like the Ford F-250 Super Duty are no different. Mud terrain tires are engineered to perform in difficult conditions like deep mud, so take a look at the [Yokohama Geolandar M/T G003](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/geolandar-m-t-g003), Hankook Dynapro MT2 RT05, and Kumho Road Venture MT71 if you want a set of 275/65R20 tires that are great for heavy off-road driving.

While many drivers take their pickup truck off-road from time to time, some elect to solely keep their ride on paved roads. All-season tires are built to perform on dry, wet, and wintry roads, making them a popular choice for drivers. Consider the Bridgestone Dueler H/T 685, [Continental TerrainContact H/T](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/terraincontact-h-t) and Falken Wildpeak H/T02 if you want a set of 275/65R20 tires that are built to perform year-round.

Whether you drive a Chevrolet Silverado 3500 HD, Ford F-250 Super Duty, GMC Sierra 2500 HD, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 275/65R20 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
